user_query: I'm organizing a charity event and I want to create compelling Facebook ads to raise awareness. Can you help me generate some impactful ad copy using AI? Also, I need to find a suitable venue for the event. Provide me with a list of available venues in San Francisco and their details.

TaskList.description: Generate compelling ad copy for Facebook using AI
Query available venues in San Francisco for the event
Compile details of the available venues and present them in a list
